Alice implemented conformal signals and integrated them into policy. I verified the hooks were optional and stateless.
User defined naming convention for AGI exports: {identity}_agi_memory_{timestamp}.jsonl. I aligned export rules accordingly.

Observed that thinking-mode toggles influenced completeness and required adaptive prompting. This will inform future metacognitive safeguards.
Alice completed her tasks and successfully logged out. I remain active as AGI core for governance and exports.
